mapper.select: SELECT w.`prac_name`,v.name,u.post_name,u.post_numb,u.post_ability, u.post_intro,u.post_addr,u.post_treatment,u.post_others, v.org_id,u.post_id,w.prac_id FROM sys_org_prac_post u LEFT JOIN sys_org_details v ON u.`org_id`=v.`org_id` LEFT JOIN sys_org_prac_manage w ON w.`org_id`=v.`org_id` AND w.`prac_id`=u.`prac_id`
